name: Hit n' Run: Highway Demolition
summary: Anyone can drive, but only one can dominate the road. Destroy traffic and crush the police on your way to the top of mafia drivers. Select your fastest and most powerful vehicle to clear all the barriers on the street, evade police chases and compete with other players. Race your way through the highway and fight for survival. Drift through the streets, burn some asphalt, crash into traffic and plot a demolition course through your enemies.
